title: 关于领地权限
author: q2683280936
txt_content: 如何让他人不能传送到某个权限组的领地

replies.author: q2683280936
replies.txt_content:
sjkj 发表于 2015-5-27 20:42
/res set 领地名 tp false
请看清题目= =

replies.author: apple5740
replies.txt_content:
找到这里    # Set to 0 to disable subzones.
           SubzoneDepth: 100
           # Whether or not to allow teleporting to Residences.
           CanTeleport: true
   把canteleport 改成false

replies.author: q2683280936
replies.txt_content:

           SubzoneDepth: 100
           # Whether or not ...
